bioAsHtml: Byte Alchemist, Coding and Software Architecture, Technical Project Management and Complexity Taming, ICT Security Geek, Blockchain disciple and Ether Hacker, OWASP Java Project, Co-founder Brussels JUG / Devoxx4Kids, Steering Devoxx (Architecture & Security Track), Program committee Devoxx UK.
